Title: Fibrous Thread
Description:
Fine thread may conjure images of tailory, but it can serve a vital role in leatherwork as well.

Some of the Dream's hardier flora can be processed into a thread strong enough to secure even the thickest of hides and scales. If you happen upon any dense fiber during your travels, you would be well-served by bringing it to my colleague in the Dream.
ObjectivesText: Bring 1 Emerald Fiber from enchanted thickets in the Emerald Dream.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Cerwyn in the Emerald Dream.

Objectives.Text: Complete the events of "Enter the Dream"
